title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 258: Featuring David Ayres + Akil Thomas
description:
On Thursday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets the guys are joined by David Ayres and Akil Thomas. The EBUG sensation joins (32:33) to discuss how crazy his life has been the past few weeks, the Leafs, his career and more. The boys then hear from Akil Thomas (1:07:36), 2nd round draft pick of the LA Kings and World Juniors hero. Akil joins to discuss his clothing line, scoring the game winner at World Juniors, his career and more. The guys also talk Kendrick Perkins kids spending 16k on Fortnite, the Yotes and the NHLPA players poll.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
